page.title: 01A DAY IN THE LIFE OF LAURA
page.content:
I GO TO MY GRANS EVERY FRIDAY NIGHT TO STAY.I WAKE UP ON THE SATURDAY AT ABOUT 9.30AM.I GO DOWN THE STAIRS AND GET MY BREAKFAST OF PORRIDGE AND A SLICE OF TOAST. THEN I WATCH{TV}FOR HALF AN HOUR.MY GRANDAD RUNS KAREN AND I HOME ,AND HE STAYS FOR ABOUT AN HOUR.I GET MY{POCKET}MONEY.THEN I GO TO THE SHOP AND I BUY SOME SWEETS.WHEN I COME HOME I GO ACROSS TO PLAY WITH MY FRIEND MICHELLE.WE PLAY ON OUR SKATES.KAREN SOMETIMES PLAYS AS WELL AND SO DOES LISA.WE GO TO MAYBURN AVE.TO PLAY.AT NIGHT I WATCH TV, I USUALLY WATCH "THE PRICE IS RIGHT" THEN I GO TO BED.
LAURA MACKENZIE.
